name: Birthday Tracker
question: Alexa, open Birthday Tracker
response: Hello, welcome to birthday tracker. I can keep track of your friends and family's birthdays for you. Let's get started by adding your first birthday. Whose birthday would you like to add?

name: Birthday Tracker
question: help
response: Birthday tracker keeps track of your friends and family's birthdays. To add a birthday, simply open 'birthday tracker' and say, 'add birthday', and you will be guided through adding a birthday. Once you have added a birthday, you can ask birthday tracker to recall it. For example, if you have added David's birthday, then you can say to Alexa, 'Alexa, ask birthday tracker when David's birthday is'. I can also tell you what day somebody's birthday falls on, how many days until a birthday, whose birthdays are in a given month and the age of the person whose birthday it is. You can check out this skill's description on the Alexa store for more information. Try asking me about a birthday now.

name: Birthday Tracker

response: Goodbye

name: Magical Adventure
question: Alexa, open Magical Adventure
response: <Short audio>

name: Magical Adventure
question: help
response: In timeless Adventure, you wander through the game choosing options prompted at each scene. But some actions are available without prompting. Try using action commands on things you find, like "look at, take, move, open, or drink". For example, you can say "move rock" or "drink water". At any time you can issue the following commands. To see what your carrying, say "Inventory". To hear your options again, say "repeat options." To hear the entire scene again, say "repeat scene." To hear more verbose descriptions say "verbose descriptions. To hear briefer descriptions say "brief descriptions". To get hints say "hint". In order to revisit the previous scene, say "go back." To start the game over, say "start again." To hear these commands again, say "help", or go to Timeless Adventure on the Alexa store to see a full list.Now, what would you like to do?

name: Magical Adventure
question: stop
response: Thank you for playing Timeless Adventure.Goodbye.
